content.rendered:
Inside Sales | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Large mobile entertainment company is hiring high-energy, motivated Inside Sales Agents
  • Representative will take on an average of 75 calls per day to prospective clients
  • Great opportunity for new graduates or candidates with a lot of sales experience
  • Hours pay + commission, plus bonus opportunities
